activities: Employee demographic information is collected in order to set up medical exams.  This information includes home contact information as well as work demographic information.  After exams are done, exam results including lab work results are obtained and compiled in order for our on-staff physicians to review.  Physicians release a work clearance status.
eucountries: Austria, Belgium, Bulgaria, Cyprus, Czech Republic, Denmark, Estonia, Finland, France, Germany, Greece, Hungary, Iceland, Ireland, Italy, Latvia, Liechtenstein, Lithuania, Luxembourg, Malta, Netherlands, Norway, Poland, Portugal, Romania, Slovakia, Slovenia, Spain, Sweden, United Kingdom
personaldata: human resources data and medical information
recoursemech: WorkCare will cooperate with the EU data protection authorities (DPAs).  Of course, WorkCare prefers to have the opportunity to rectify or correct any issues before escalation to an independent recourse mechanism.
